scripts.say: The SG radar is picking up something, it located the unknown Siren ship model.
Oh? Do Sirens also have couriers? Hahahaha, this can also be considered a big catch.
Our opponent is trying to flee the battlefield, full speed ahead!
Hey, now that you’ve been found, there’s no chance you’ll escape! All ships maneuver to battle positions and start intercepting the enemy ships! Hehe, it’s about time we get to have a good workout.
Hmm... talk about Siren technology... to be able to sail at such speed. It's not enough to rely on our artillery attacks alone...
Well, luckily for us. Right before we set sail, I received a new batch of “toys” from Akashi. Hehe, it looks to be quite useful~
A new toy? These are… mines?
Correct. We can use these mines to block our opponent’s escape route. This way, we can ensure that nothing will slip through our fingers~
Hehe, this is getting more and more interesting! Ok, let’s have ourselves a happy little chase!
